import React from 'react' import { UilTemperature, UilTear, UilWind, UilSun, UilSunset, } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import { formatToLocalTime, iconUrlFromCode } from '../services/weatherService'; function TemparatureAndDetails({weather:{ details,icon,temp,temp_min,temp_max,sunrise,sunset,speed,humidity,feels_like,timezone }}) { return (

{details}

{`${temp.toFixed()}째`}

Real feel: {`${feels_like.toFixed()}째`}
Humidity: {`${humidity.toFixed()} %`}
Wind: {`${speed.toFixed()} km/h`}

Rise:{formatToLocalTime(sunrise,timezone,"hh:mm a")}

|

Set:{formatToLocalTime(sunset,timezone,"hh:mm a")}

|

High:{`${temp_max.toFixed()}째`}

|

Low:{`${temp_min.toFixed()}째`}

|

) } export default TemparatureAndDetails
